author: Doug

review: I have owned the Chromecast and the Fire TV Stick. The only one I use now is the Fire TV because of a couple of reasons. First of all, it has its own remote which is more convenient than having to use a smart phone. Second, it has a nice user display on the screen which lets use make choices rather than having to find out which apps will cast to the TV. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I would like to see more free shows through Amazon Prime TV instead of having to choose Hulu or Netflix.
author: Jerome Z.

review: My Husband and I love this! I would highly recommend this to someone who doesn't watch a lot of TV but would still like access to certain shows.  Although most shows require you to be a prime member, I would say it is worth the investment.  $100 a year for prime membership is a lot better than a month payment to another TV provider.
